ovdesc.p: Live file to record the static details of the third party customer for Payable and Receivable asset type balances
This file is updated when the entry is processed with target account in TDGL.DETAILS field.
Currently target account is passed by SEC.TRADE only.

desc.p: Format of the ID is PR-Customer number-Transaction Reference
The customer to which the PR.CUSTOMER.BALANCE record belongs
Third Party Customer id, who is not holding any account.
Indicates the currency of the transaction.
3 Alpha-numeric Currency code.
Internal file, no input
Category that will be applied to the Payable / Receivable movements for the underlying transaction.
For SEC.TRADE it will be set to '22000'.
1 - 5 Character Category Code. (Internal System field.)
Internal file, no input
Product for PR.CUSTOMER.BALANCE is 'PR' which is PAYABLE / RECEIVABLE
The Sub Asset Type of the underlying transaction if it is used.
For Securities, this is the Sub Asset Type defined in the SECURITY.MASTER record corresponding to the Security Code defined in the SEC.TRADE.
The asset types of the balances maintained for the transaction.
Maturity date is the value date of the transaction.
Records in PR.CUSTOMER.BALANCE will be held upto the maturity date and no balance left for Payable / Receivable asset types
Standard Date Format
Internal file, no input
